Steph + Mat

Bollocks i say! bollocks!

Steph

Steph was born and raised in Edison, NJ. She likes cats and budgies. Budge budge budge. Just all day errday. She likes to eat ice cream, she is currently in a donut phase. Ask her what her favorite donut place is. Yup just do that I guess so? But I wonder if the text itself on the page will wrap where i hit enter. How do I sing like a budge

Mat

Hi I am a Mat cat. I like to kiss the budge. Because she is so soft and fluffy. Sometimes she is really smelly But I like to sniff her anyways. SNIIIIIIFFFFFF. Mmm. Yummy. Sometimes I sniff so hard, her feathers go into my nose which is tickly. It annoys Steph when I do this (and Budge) but I do it anyways.
